What can i say! Insane pizzas, with such fresh ingredients! We went for one each but could have easily shared! Has a perfect laid back, street food style. Pizzas arrive in boxes so no washing up. Beers in plastic cups (2euro). Service was quick on a Sunday lunch & let you take a doggy bag home - not that we needed it!Finished off the meal with a complimentary shot of limoncello straight from the freezer!Ooh top tip - pizzas are 7 euro on a tues & weds.
